channel.title: HELP! : Chaning Npc's Hp, and adding items for them to drop, and drop rates!
channel.description:
[COLOR=red]1.Ok I have the Para source from jesse downloaded and I want to lower the HP of the Mith Drags and ass Abby whips as a drop of the abby demon.[/COLOR]
[COLOR=red]2. How do I edit the drop rates?[/COLOR]
Also Dark bow of dark beast.
Very new to coding please be gentle :D
GO into detail pls
Here is what: Npc Drop file looks like. [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/dlj7k4.jpg[/img]
And thats it notjing else in there.

item.title: HELP! : Chaning Npc's Hp, and adding items for them to drop, and drop rates!
item.dc:creator: @Never_Again Never Again
item.description:
@Never_Again wrote:

K thanks might pm you my msn if I have trouble.

zuqgyf.jpg447×639

Thats what i got I notice it says 4151 (abby whip)
but ppl complain they never get it? what all do those number mean?

where is the drop rate?

Read full topic
item.source: HELP! : Chaning Npc's Hp, and adding items for them to drop, and drop rates!

item.title: HELP! : Chaning Npc's Hp, and adding items for them to drop, and drop rates!
item.dc:creator: @suikodenscape suikodenscape
item.description:
@suikodenscape wrote:

ignore that. If you have a floder in source that says Config, open it. Npc drops.cfg and npc.cfg. open em and it is pretty clear how to change HP, says “health” also for npc just copy one of them but change the npcdrop = 2263 to your npc id.

Read full topic
